about_snippet_text: We are a supportive network that seeks to build a cohesive and inclusive community for everyone in Bergen. Through our activities and events, we aim to enhance communication, provide support, and create new opportunities for families and individuals.
activities_page_subtitle: Watch the most beautiful moments and memories from our diverse events
team_page_subtitle: Meet the individuals who make all this possible
about_page_subtitle: A bridge for communication and building a cohesive community in the heart of Bergen.
contact_page_subtitle: We are always happy to hear your opinions and suggestions
